title: Opinion: Why I decided to share all my health information with ChatGPT Health
description: “I don’t think people should have to go through 18 years of brain cancer to understand their own health records,” writes Liz Salmi.
content: “I don’t think people should have to go through 18 years of brain cancer to understand their own health records,” writes Liz Salmi.
